document_data.name: Red Mazzie
document_data.mainbody: '''Red Mazzie''' was the Court Wizard of [[Damara]] in the late 15th century [[DR]]. He was said to be most talented wizard in the kingdom.
document_data.History:
In [[1484 DR]], in order to gain the favor of King [[Yarin Frostmantle]], Red Mazzie captured the [[copper dragon]] sisters [[Tazmikella]] and [[Ilnezhara]]. However they were freed by [[Jarlaxle]] and Red Mazzie was without his prize when Captain [[Dreylil Andrus]] arrived to check his claim.

When King Frostmantle was assassinated, Red Mazzie devised a plan to cover it up as a natural death in order to ensure a peaceful transition of power to Frostmantle's widow, Queen [[Concettina Delcasio]].<ref>{{Cite digital book/Hero/Nook| |27}}
